# Settlement of ETH
This document presents the recommended steps in order to settle the Nahmii 1
balance of NII of account `0x7d093B992259EC4eb0D1325a38c2f7A7895EB5C9`.

The ordered steps of contract function invocations are included below and in
the corresponding [steps.json](./steps.json). Please read [the general recipe
for settling Nahmii 1 balance](../../README.md) before starting on the first
step of settlement.

## Ordered steps
### Step 1
#### Contract
*DriipSettlementChallengeByPayment* ([0x906fd331f5e382f05b8ae26900140c37f0db139a](https://etherscan.io/address/0x906fd331f5e382f05b8ae26900140c37f0db139a))
#### Method name
*startChallengeFromPayment*
#### Method payload
```

```
#### Encode method args
* *payment*: 
```
{
  "seals": {
    "wallet": {
      "hash": "0x4a78030ad6ddaf135695da66e4b522b3bfe15fa139573da62c46739887f1a990",
      "signature": {
        "s": "0x5c1927ea94aec772f6ef42c0dddf557b194c55b4c917bf9acc62ea9caceccd1f",
        "r": "0x63d63697cfdbbb1aba81de3781ecd65d89e772aa3e688255948c994d46d571a0",
        "v": 27
```

### Step 2
#### Contract

*settlePayment*
#### Method payload
```

```

### Step 3
#### Contract

*withdraw*
#### Method payload
```

```
